DataSource.Query: SELECT sales.orders.order_id, sales.orders.transaction_timestamp, sales.orders.value_date, account.get_name_by_user_id(sales.orders.user_id) AS entered_by, core.get_office_name_by_office_id(sales.orders.office_id) AS office_name, sales.orders.terms, sales.orders.internal_memo, inventory.get_customer_name_by_customer_id(sales.orders.customer_id) AS customer_name FROM sales.orders WHERE sales.orders.order_id = @order_id;

SELECT sales.order_details.item_id, inventory.items.item_code, inventory.items.item_name, sales.order_details.price, sales.order_details.quantity, inventory.get_unit_name_by_unit_id(sales.order_details.unit_id) AS unit, sales.order_details.price * sales.order_details.quantity AS amount, sales.order_details.discount_rate, sales.order_details.tax, ROUND( ( (sales.order_details.price + sales.order_details.tax) * ((100 - sales.order_details.discount_rate)/100) * sales.order_details.quantity) , 4) AS total FROM sales.order_details INNER JOIN inventory.items ON inventory.items.item_id = sales.order_details.item_id WHERE sales.order_details.order_id = @order_id ORDER BY sales.order_details.order_detail_id;
